author: jasonnawara
title: Butterbeer Ice Cream Is Here To Freak Out ‚ÄòHarry Potter‚Äô Fans
text:
Warner Bros./Yeunglings
Sold at only the best dives frequented by Harry Potter, Butterbeer finally made its way to muggles everywhere when Universal Studios imported the delicious brew to the expansive theme park, The Wizarding World of Harry Potter . By now, thousands if not millions of people have had their upper lip covered in foam after gulping down the creamy beverage, but there was something missing ‚Äî a semi-solid, chewable form of the drink every magic wielder covets. 
Yeunglings, the premium ice cream maker (which may have some wizard blood in their lineage with the feats they pull off), has introduced Butterbeer ‚ÄúSuper Premium‚Äù ice cream, and it seems‚Ä¶ Magical. Yeah, I went there. Pun friggin‚Äô intended.
The ice cream is half buttercream ice cream, half butterscotch ice cream, and is twisted with a butterscotch swirl . Yeungling‚Äôs said, ‚Äúwe hope we made J.K. Rowling proud with this flavor.‚Äù I say, ‚Äúhow could they disappoint?‚Äù
According to the Twitterverse, the Butterbeer ice cream is already satisfying muggles across the world:
@KatyRose9 butter beer ice cream is actually really good
‚Äî Eric Tweet (@Tweet_isME) March 20, 2017 
DUDE TAKE ME BACK the butter beer ice cream https://t.co/NFfEy542P5 
‚Äî M E Lü•Ä (@bckoffxx) March 10, 2017 

And driving others mad:
https://twitter.com/Bianca_Robinson/status/843980813746274304 
BUTTERBEER ICECREAM?! I needs it.
‚Äî Veronica Mars (@veroicone) March 21, 2017 
@YuenglingsIC I checked my local Harris Teeter and they didn't have butter beer. Thank you, my teenage daughters love butter beer!
‚Äî gcfio (@gcfio) March 21, 2017 
THERE'S BUTTERBEER ICE CREAM NOW WHAT I NEED TO TRY THIS!!!
‚Äî Jasmine (@sheerancastlex) March 21, 2017 

And some are even combining all the varieties of Butterbeer into epic Butter Beer sessions: 
I shared the holy trinity of magic tonight, warm, regular and ice cream butter beer. Thankful for friends who share ‚òïÔ∏è pic.twitter.com/UXdvCji0te 
‚Äî the virgin missy (@MelisaManaged) March 16, 2017 

If you ask me, there‚Äôs no reason not to make a Butterbeer float with Butterbeer ice cream in actual Butterbeer. Something that good will split your soul into a consumable Horcrux.
(Via The DailyDot )
